author: Katherine Clarke
title: Bruce Willis Downsizes in Manhattan
text:
Weeks after finding a buyer for their sprawling Central Park West apartment, actor Bruce Willis and his wife, Emma, are downsizing to a smaller Manhattan home.
The couple has gone into contract for a four-bedroom, roughly 3,000-square-foot apartment at One West End, according to the listing agents. The last asking price on the unit was $7.9 million, according to one of the listing agents, John Gomes of Douglas Elliman. He declined to comment on the final contract price.
